string-array.name: ThemeChangelog
string-array.item: Substratum Template -> MIUI Icons, rebased on release 704
First public release, now has logos

SuperSU, Lucky Patcher, Flud, DVGet, ADM, Evernote, Facebook Lite, Camera FV-5, Total Commander, Google Authentificator, Google Drive, Google Calendar, True Phone, Titanium Backup, Snapseed, Yandex Mail
Yandex Metro update, AIDA64, OpenVPN, Jelly, 2DC, Yandex Navigator
Updated Street View, added Chronus, Cinema FV-5, MobiCalc, Dr.Tariff
Rebased on the new Kotlin theme branch
